input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product name information.

Product name:
Life is good Women's Snuggle Low Cut Stripes Socks

Product keywords:
Great for keeping your feet warm
Polyester, Spandex
Imported
The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives
Small Life is good label at the top of each pair
One size fits most
Company donates 10% of its annual net profits to their non-profit The Playmakers Foundation

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Improve your comfort with Life is good's plush & cozy Lightweight Snuggle socks are perfect for keeping your toes toasty. Small Life is good. label at the top of each pair. One size fits most. Life is good donates 10% of its annual net profits to its non-profit The Playmakers Foundation. The Playmakers Foundation uses play therapy to aid kids who have experienced trauma in their lives.
input_text.Response B: The Life is good Women's Snuggle Low Cut Stripes Socks are a classic, simple way to keep your feet warm and cozy. Made from a combination of Polyester and Spandex, these socks are comfortable and durable. These socks are also a great way to support the Playmakers Foundation, a non-profit that uses play therapy to aid children who have experienced trauma in their lives. With every purchase, Life is good donates 10% of its annual net profits to the foundation.

label_annotations.factors_a: Just the style of the response, it seemed like B made more of an effort to sell the product
